Title(s): ‘Quomodo dominus ihesu Cristus apparuit sancto Gregorio’
_description: John Audelay, ‘Quomodo dominus ihesu Cristus apparuit sancto Gregorio’ — an introduction to 5072 and 3965

BodDou302.First Lines:
Apon a day saynt gregoreSong his mas at rome
                    truly…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…þen loke þou say anonDewowtle þis
                    confessicoun
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
Quomodo dominus ihesus christus apparuit / sancto gregorio in tale
                        effugie (f. 12va)
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 79-80.
